title: Computing Technician
oneLiner: Day to day specialised technical support to members of staff and students, Apple and Windows system administration, specialist lab and equipment maintenance, UX lab technician, budget manager, neuroscience specialist, integration software developer, and fabrication specialist.
description: Besides my role as a technician, I am actively involved in numerous coding projects, system administration, and fabrication-related tasks.

section.subtitle: General Responsibilities
section.text: Supporting the computing department with IT-related tasks, maintenance, and documentation.
responsibilities: IT support for members of staff.
Fabrication specialist [Woodworking, Metalworking, Laser cutting, 3D printing].

section.subtitle: Project: Laptop Locker
section.text: Developed an integration solution using the LockNcharge locker API and Goldsmiths Computing booking system, allowing students to book laptops instead of iMacs, potentially saving the university over Â£200,000.
responsibilities: Utilized web scraping libraries: requests, Selenium, BeautifulSoup.
Merged LockNcharge locker API and hardware with the Lorensberg Connect2 booking system.
Implemented dynamic database updates for record-keeping and state changes for the locker.

section.subtitle: Project: Automated Form Filler
section.text: During a lab upgrade involving 160+ iMacs, an automated solution was developed to streamline the form submission process required for recycling the machines, using web scraping.
responsibilities: Automated form submission using web scraping techniques.
Streamlined the recycling process for IT services.

section.subtitle: Project: Bookable Workplace Data Visualization
section.text: Developed a simple visualizer using React, Material UI, and a JSON file to track workstation bookings, addressing an overflow of students in workshop labs.
responsibilities: Used React, Material UI, and JSON for data tracking.

section.subtitle: Project: Car Simulation
section.text: Worked on an interactive car simulation project in the UX lab, managing expectations with senior lecturers and delivering a customizable touchscreen UI solution.

skillsGained: Frontend development with React and Material UI.
